Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • Thing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Critter, Player, Treasure

    public abstract class Thing
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for anything which can be found in a Room.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Get long description of the Thing (possibly with extra info at subclass' discretion)..
        Note: not to be used for saving or encoding due possible extra info being included.
        Returns:
        Long description

      • getShortDescription

        public java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Get short description of the Thing.
        Returns:
        short description Note: This name is used to represent the Thing in text and to choose it in dialogs.

      • repr

        public abstract java.lang.String repr()
        Get a representation of the object suitable for saving.
        Returns:
        A single line encoding enough information to identify the type and recreate it.
